title: My Data Projects
text:
Welcome to my collection of data projects.
Each project showcases my ability to apply R, Python, and Power BI to real-world data — from analysis and visualization to building interactive dashboards.





Tools: R, ggplot2, caret, tidyverse
Published on: R Pubs
Overview:
This project explores customer churn behavior using statistical analysis and predictive modeling.
I applied logistic regression and decision tree models to identify key factors influencing customer retention, and visualized the insights using R.
👉 View the Full Project on R Pubs







An interactive dashboard tracking revenue trends, regional performance, and KPIs.



A Python script automating data transformation and report generation for improved efficiency.
🔙 Return to Home

title: Welcome to My Portfolio
text:
Hello! I’m Caldwell Muboyi, a Statistics Graduate (University of Zimbabwe, 2.1 Class) and a passionate Data Analyst skilled in R, Python, and Power BI.
I specialize in transforming raw data into actionable insights, creating interactive dashboards, and delivering solutions that help businesses make data-driven decisions.




📊 Data Analysis & Visualization: Clean, explore, and visualize datasets in R & Python

🤖 Predictive Modeling: Build models to forecast trends and customer behavior

📈 Dashboard Development: Create interactive dashboards in Power BI and Excel

👥 Customer Insights: Focus on enhancing customer experience and retention







Analyzed customer behavior to predict churn and identify retention strategies.
Tools: R, Python, Power BI
Focus: Enhancing customer experience — the key to customer retention
👉 View Project on RPubs




Developed interactive dashboards combining multiple datasets.
Integrated R and Python visualizations for dynamic insights.
👉 View Project
